overview: Bai ji (Dev Kharoud) a highly feared businessman gets tricked by Boota Singh (Gurpreet Ghuggi), a street smart into unknowingly hiring him and his entire family. What follows suit is a comedy of errors as Boota Singh and family try to hide their true identities from Bai Ji. What will Bai Ji, a man of principles who doesn't think twice before avenging those who wrong him, do once the truth comes out?
title: Bai Ji Kuttange
